name: Radisson Royal Hotel Cali

reviews.text: I recently stayed at the Radisson in Cali. The hotel is located in South Cali, adjacent to the Guiness shopping center, and across the street from the famous Unicentro shopping mall.
reviews.title: Radisson Royal Hotel Cali

description: The Radisson Royal Hotel Cali is conveniently situated next to the Trade Center Corporate Complex in a charming residential area of Cali, Colombia. Hotel guests enjoy a variety of amenities, including a Business Center, a Health Club and wireless Internet access. The Radisson Royal Cali Hotel is just 15 minutes from downtown and a short distance from a number of local attractions. Book your stay online and see why we're one of the best Cali, Colombia hotels.
